data.text: Tuun inchong mi ngai, keidiang nara-ngairu! nangni chungnga kaheiwasik poongna jarra chapru khat-um inwai inlang chapru!
Nangni inchongkha mangjei, halli nangni puondiar ngaikha in-ngeii'n bakjei.

Nangni soonna li dangka kha thir-eek kanjei, halli hiwa thir-eek in nangni chungnga sakhi eta halli nangni taksa kha mei angta akaangsik eii. Nangni'n ahekna nikhuo ngaihin ningkarei ngaikha ningbuk. Matt 6:19

Nangni ningleiya chuonkatho ngai chuonthoman kha eteii pemakchu. Inmani ngai chaprasa kha ra-ngairu! Nangni leiya chuonkatho ngai chaprasa kha Pathian, Akaraatkhet Pumi kuorkuung tungjei. Innidan 24:14-15
Hiwa nuoipilchung ringkhuo hin nangni taksa hoina li inchong karaang ringkhuo-ah ningomjei. Thina nikhuo sik-ah nangni'n ningpum katha-ah ningwaijei.
Nangni'n kamasialmak akadik mikha noonkuung ningpeya ningthat, halli ama'n nangnidiang zootmak thomak.

Ulenai ngai, kadeiraat eru, Pumi juomaklaiseng. Enru leimi ngai'n in-iwor muchi ngaikha akatha hong-inra sik eii tia ka-ngaaklan omlekleiya inngaak. Inmani'n ka-ngaaklan omlekleiya khuolum khat-um suunlai ruosur kha in-ngaak.
Nangni um ka-ngaaklan emaru. Nangni ngamna kha mincheetru, ajarchu Pumi ajuonasik nikhuo kha anaijei.
Ulenai ngai, Pathian in nangni chungnga chong tanmak nasik nangni li nangni inzootmak thomaru, ajarchu chong katanpa kha inkhar kuungnga ngirra omjei.
Ulenai ngai, poongraal na-ah ka-ngaaklanmak ngai minkhina sik-ah, Pumi ramingnga kaleiril Pathian Chongkachoi ngaikha ngaidonru.

Rawaan katha mi ngai tia eini'n nikoi ajarchu inmani kadei inraat. Nangni'n Job deiraatna thurchi kha ningjetjei, halli ahekna achu Pumi'n amadiang ipeii ngaikha nangni'n ningjetjei. Pumi chu minriang khat-um minriang malungroon in asip. Job 1:21,22; 2:10; Minpkla 103:8

Ulenai ngai, marwaan emakli nuoipil emakli ang-khattak raming ti-inlang chongkhomaak insaammaru. Nangni'n ningzoot kha kinzoot tiru ningzootmak kha zootmung tiru, khawa e-inchu Pathian chongtanna nuoiya omnutun. Matt 5:34-37
Nangni karra tume kapoong? Inmani'n Pathian diang nirasu. Nangni karra tume karok? Inmani'n minpaakna laa sakrasu.
Nangni karra tume kana? Inmani'n koisuok uparup ngai koirasu, achungnga olive sariak minnootrasu halli Pumi ramingnga Pathian diang minnirasu. Mk 6:13
Halli kangamnale inruoiya Pathian diang innipi khan kanapa kha adamsik eii; Pumi'n inpumma kana kha mindamsik eii halli inmani'n manu inleitho ngaikha ngaidam pisik eii.
Nangni'n ningdam nasik-ah, ningmanu ngaikha inrilsuokru halli inkhatli inkhat sik-ah Pathian diang innipiru. Akadik miring in Pathian ini khan ranak om khat-um akatha aheichoi.
Elijah eini ka-ang miring inkhat alei-eii. Ama'n ruo surmaknasik Pathian diang malung kaluut-ah aleini, halli kumthum le tharuk hi neipil chungnga ruo leisurmak. 1 Reng 17:1
Ama'n Pathian diang aleininook, halli marwaan makheiya ruo ajuosur khat-um neipilchung khan angrakip hong-inra jei. 1 Reng 18:42-45
Ulenai ngai, nangni karra miring inkhat akadik makheiya lamleiitiang aleisiya halli miring inkhat in ahongruoikir inchu,
Akadikmak lamma leikasi kha woikhat akadik lamma akahongruoikir miring khan khawa miringpa ratha kha kathisik-ah inphut asan halli manu katamtak kha amakhupi tihi ngaidonru.
